Plot: About young British journalist, George Hogg, who with the assistance of a courageous Australian nurse, saves a group of orphaned children during the Japanese occupation of China in 1937.
Title: The Children of Huang Shi
Actors: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Radha Mitchell, Yun-Fat Chow, Michelle Yeoh
tomatoConsensus: This beautifully photographed but dramatically flat war drama recounts an important chapter in history with little cinematic freshness.
